"Terms & Conditions" refer to the set of rules, agreements, and guidelines established by a company or organization that outline the terms of use or purchase for their services, products, or platforms. These terms typically cover various aspects such as user rights, responsibilities, limitations, privacy policies, and legal disclaimers, aiming to govern the relationship between the user and the provider. Or the easy word is: Poke around and find out.
